cgcloud__Asset_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Asset_Template__c
cgcloud__Asset_Template__c.description: An asset is a physical element that has a certain value which a manufacturer can place at a customer's location (retailer, bar, hotel, shop, and so on), and it can be associated to a POS (such as a shelf, cooler, fridge, and more).

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Blind_Mode__c.description: Defines whether the customerâ€™s assets are initially shown. This setting is applicable for mobility devices.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Location_Type__c.description: Indicates the location at which the asset is to be used.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org to which the asset template belongs.

cgcloud__Scanner_Policy__c.description: Defines whether the asset audit is to be run via a scanner. This setting is applicable for mobility devices.

cgcloud__Scanning_Required__c.description: Defines whether the asset audit is to be run via a scanner. This setting is applicable for mobility devices.
